description: Use the DescribeGroupMembership operation to determine if a user is a member of the specified group. If the user exists and is a member of the specified group, an associated GroupMember object is returned.

parameters.name: MemberName
parameters.description: The user name of the user that you want to search for.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the group that you want to search.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID for the Amazon Web Services account that the group is in. Currently, you use the ID for the Amazon Web Services account that contains your Amazon QuickSight account.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace that includes the group you are searching within.

nested_items.name: GroupMember
nested_items.description: A member of an Amazon QuickSight group. Currently, group members must be users. Groups can't be members of another group. .

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the group member (user).

nested_items.name: MemberName
nested_items.description: The name of the group member (user).

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
